record.name: Password Reset
record.description: Request the reset of a personal password to the Company network. Use this request when you have forgotten your current password. A new temporary password will be generated and sent to your company email address.
record.detailedDescription: Request the reset of a personal password to the Company network. Use this request when you have forgotten your current password. A new temporary password will be generated and sent to your company email address.
record.options: <form ignoreDvd="false"><text id="HostName" label="Target windows machine on which the local user exists." mandatory="true" mandatoryResult="true" visible="true" visibleResult="true"/><text id="TargetedUsername" label="User for which the password should be changed." mandatory="true" mandatoryResult="true" visible="true" visibleResult="true"/><text id="EmailTo" label="The destination of the notification (email address)." mandatory="true" mandatoryResult="true" visible="true" visibleResult="true"/><text id="EmailServer" label="The email server to send the notification through." mandatory="true" mandatoryResult="true" visible="true" visibleResult="true"/><text id="EmailFrom" label="The originator of the message (email "from" address)." mandatory="true" mandatoryResult="true" visible="true" visibleResult="true"/></form>
record.optionsAlias: <form ignoreDvd="false"><text id="HostName" label="Target windows machine on which the local user exists." mandatory="true" mandatoryResult="true" visible="true" visibleResult="true"/><text id="TargetedUsername" label="User for which the password should be changed." mandatory="true" mandatoryResult="true" visible="true" visibleResult="true"/><text id="EmailTo" label="The destination of the notification (email address)." mandatory="true" mandatoryResult="true" visible="true" visibleResult="true"/><text id="EmailServer" label="The email server to send the notification through." mandatory="true" mandatoryResult="true" visible="true" visibleResult="true"/><text id="EmailFrom" label="The originator of the message (email "from" address)." mandatory="true" mandatoryResult="true" visible="true" visibleResult="true"/></form>

option.desc.option.desc: Target windows machine on which the local user exists.
User for which the password should be changed.
The destination of the notification (email address).
